meanings.meaning: How Late It Was, How Late

vlive.korean: 얼마나 썼지? How long did I use them? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊
vlive.english: How long did I use them?

vlive.korean: 거의 지금... 얼마나 썼지? It's been like... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊
얼마나 할 건데? How much will you get paid? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자 때문에 인간관계 X됨 [엑스엑스(XX)] - 하이라이트
vlive.english: How much will you get paid?

vlive.korean: [걱정] 이거 얼마나 마셔야 되냐? [Worried] How much do I need to drink? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Worried] How much do I need to drink?

vlive.korean: '화보 찍는데 얼마나 걸려요?' "How long does it take to do a pictorial shoot?" 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: "How long does it take to do a pictorial shoot?"

examples.korean: How long did you spend on your homework? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너 숙제 하는 데 시간이 얼마나 들었니[얼마나 오래 걸렸니]? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How long did you spend on your homework? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: How quickly can you prepare the paperwork? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 서류를 얼마나 빨리 준비할 수 있으세요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How quickly can you prepare the paperwork? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: How mortifying to have to apologize to him! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그에게 사과를 해야 하다니 얼마나 굴욕스러운지! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How mortifying to have to apologize to him! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You sly old devil! How long have you known? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 음흉한 늙은 악마 같으니라구! 당신은 안 지 얼마나 된 거야? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You sly old devil! How long have you known? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 여행이 얼마나 오래 걸릴 것인지를 잘못 계산했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. Add to Wordbook
